Meat.title: Beef Stroganoff
Meat.description: Tender strips of beef sautéed with onions and mushrooms in a creamy white wine and sour cream sauce, served over buttered egg noodles or rice. This classic Russian dish is rich and flavorful, with a comforting blend of textures.

Meat.title: Pork Shashlik
Meat.description: Marinated chunks of pork, skewered and grilled to perfection. Served with a side of fresh vegetables, pita bread, and a tangy garlic sauce. This dish is ideal for those who enjoy smoky, savory flavors with a hint of spice.

Meat.title: Pelmeni
Meat.description: Traditional Russian dumplings filled with a savory mixture of minced beef, pork, and onions, seasoned with spices. These bite-sized dumplings are boiled until tender and served with a dollop of sour cream and a sprinkle of fresh dill. Pelmeni offer a hearty and comforting taste of Russian cuisine, ideal as a satisfying main course or appetizer.

Meat.title: Chicken Kiev
Meat.description: Breaded and fried chicken breast stuffed with a garlic herb butter, creating a deliciously crispy exterior and a flavorful, buttery interior. Served with mashed potatoes and steamed vegetables, this dish is a classic Russian favorite.

Meat.title: Veal Cutlet
Meat.description: A succulent veal cutlet, pan-seared to perfection and topped with a rich mushroom sauce made from sautéed mushrooms, onions, and a splash of white wine. Accompanied by creamy mashed potatoes and steamed asparagus, this dish offers a delightful balance of tender meat and savory sauce.

Soups.title: Borscht
Soups.description: A vibrant beetroot soup with a hearty blend of cabbage, potatoes, and carrots, enriched with tender beef chunks. Served hot with a dollop of sour cream and a sprinkle of fresh dill. This traditional dish offers a unique balance of earthy and tangy flavors.

Soups.title: Soljanka
Soups.description: A robust and tangy soup with a medley of smoked meats, pickles, olives, and a tomato base. Garnished with fresh herbs and a slice of lemon, this soup provides a complex, bold flavor profile that is both hearty and refreshing.

Soups.title: Ukha
Soups.description: A clear fish broth soup featuring tender pieces of white fish, potatoes, carrots, and onions. Flavored with fresh herbs and a hint of lemon, Ukha is a light yet flavorful dish that captures the essence of traditional Russian cuisine.

Soups.title: Okroshka
Soups.description: A traditional Russian cold soup made with a refreshing mix of diced vegetables such as cucumbers, radishes, and potatoes, combined with cooked meats like ham or sausage. The soup is served in a chilled kvass or kefir base and garnished with fresh dill and green onions. It's a light, tangy, and revitalizing dish, perfect for warm weather.

Soups.title: Rassolnik
Soups.description: A hearty sour pickle soup with beef or pork, barley, and a mix of vegetables like carrots and potatoes. The addition of pickles gives this soup its distinctive tangy flavor, balanced by the savory meat and hearty barley.

Salads.title: Olivier Salad
Salads.description: A classic Russian salad combining diced potatoes, carrots, pickles, boiled eggs, and tender chunks of chicken or ham, all tossed in a creamy mayonnaise dressing. Garnished with fresh herbs, this salad is a festive favorite known for its rich, satisfying taste.

Salads.title: Shuba
Salads.description: A layered salad featuring salted herring, finely chopped onions, grated boiled beets, carrots, and potatoes, all mixed with a generous layer of mayonnaise. This colorful and flavorful dish is a traditional Russian favorite, offering a unique blend of sweet, salty, and tangy flavors.

Salads.title: Vinaigrette
Salads.description: A refreshing Russian salad made with diced beets, potatoes, carrots, pickles, and onions, all tossed in a tangy vinaigrette dressing. This dish is vibrant in color and offers a delightful mix of textures and flavors, perfect as a light yet hearty option.

Salads.title: Caesar Salad
Salads.description: A twist on the classic Caesar salad, featuring crisp romaine lettuce, grilled chicken breast, crunchy croutons, and shaved Parmesan cheese, all tossed in a tangy Caesar dressing. This salad is both satisfying and refreshing, ideal for a light lunch or dinner.

Salads.title: Salad with Smoked Salmon
Salads.description: A gourmet salad featuring slices of smoked salmon on a bed of mixed greens, with avocado, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and red onions. Tossed with a light lemon-dill dressing, this salad is elegant and full of fresh, delicate flavors.

Drinks.title: Kvas
Drinks.description: A traditional Russian fermented beverage made from rye bread, Kvas has a slightly tangy and mildly sweet flavor with a low alcohol content. It's a refreshing and unique drink that pairs well with a variety of Russian dishes.

Drinks.title: Medovukha
Drinks.description: A traditional honey-based Russian beverage, Medovukha is mildly alcoholic and has a sweet, aromatic flavor with hints of spices and herbs. It's often served chilled and can be a delightful alternative to more common drinks.

Drinks.title: Vodka
Drinks.description: A curated tasting set featuring a selection of premium Russian vodkas, including classic varieties and artisanal options. Each vodka is served with traditional accompaniments such as pickles and rye bread, providing an authentic and immersive experience.

Drinks.title: Mors
Drinks.description: A traditional Russian berry drink made from a variety of berries such as lingonberries, cranberries, or raspberries, lightly sweetened and served chilled. Mors is known for its refreshing taste and vibrant color, offering a natural, fruity flavor with a hint of tartness.

Drinks.title: Black tea
Drinks.description: Strong and robust black tea, brewed to perfection and served with a slice of lemon or a splash of milk, depending on preference. This classic beverage provides a rich, full-bodied flavor and is a timeless choice for enjoying with meals or as a standalone refreshment.

Desserts.title: Blini
Desserts.description: Traditional Russian blini (thin pancakes) served with a generous dollop of sweet cream and a mix of fresh berries such as strawberries, blueberries, and raspberries. Lightly dusted with powdered sugar, this dish is a delightful blend of textures and flavors.

Desserts.title: Medovik
Desserts.description: A classic layered honey cake with a rich, creamy filling made from a blend of honey, sweetened condensed milk, and butter. The cake layers are soft and moist, with a subtle honey flavor that pairs beautifully with a cup of tea or coffee.

Desserts.title: Syrniki
Desserts.description: Soft and fluffy cheese pancakes made from tvorog, served with a side of fruit preserves and a dollop of sour cream. These sweet, slightly tangy pancakes are perfect for a comforting dessert.

Desserts.title: Sharlotka
Desserts.description: A traditional Russian apple pie with a buttery, flaky crust and a sweet, spiced apple filling. Often served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream or a drizzle of caramel sauce, this dessert is both comforting and delicious.

Desserts.title: Cherry Vareniki
Desserts.description: Dumplings stuffed with sweet, juicy cherries and lightly boiled until tender. Served warm with a dollop of sour cream or a drizzle of honey. These traditional Russian cherry vareniki are a delightful blend of tart and sweet, offering a comforting and satisfying dessert experience.
